headline: Crown Castle (CCI): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) has quietly drifted lower over the past few months, even as its underlying tower and fiber business remains central to US wireless networks. That disconnect is where today’s opportunity and risk begins. See our latest analysis for Crown Castle. At around $87.42, Crown Castle’s recent slide, including a weaker 3 month share price return, contrasts with a modestly positive 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is still fading as investors reassess growth and...
